Class ShoppingCartController

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizza.ShoppingCartController
public class ShoppingCartController extends Object
The `ShoppingCartController` manages the shopping cart UI in the RuPizzeria app, allowing users to view and modify their current order by adding, removing, or clearing pizzas. It calculates and displays the subtotal, sales tax, and total price, and provides navigation to the main menu and order placement.
Author:
Raashi Maheshwari, Tanvi Yamarthy

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, setting up event handlers and displaying the current order details if available.

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder(Order order)
      Sets the current order and updates the order summary display with the order details.
      Parameters:
      order - The current order to display in the shopping cart.

    • backToMain

      private void backToMain()
      Navigates the user back to the main menu of the RuPizzeria app.

    • placeOrder

      private void placeOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Places the current order, if there are pizzas in the order, and clears the current order for the next one. Displays success or error messages as appropriate.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered when placing the order.

    • removeSelectedPizza

      private void removeSelectedPizza(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes the selected pizza from the current order. If no pizza is selected, displays an error message.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered when removing a pizza from the order.

    • clearOrder

      private void clearOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Clears all pizzas from the current order and updates the display.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered when clearing the order.

    • updateOrderSummary

      private void updateOrderSummary()
      Updates the order summary by calculating and displaying the details such as subtotal, sales tax, and total price. It also updates the list of pizzas in the current order.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an error alert with the provided title and message.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the error alert.
      message - The message to display in the error alert.

    • showSuccess

      private void showSuccess(String title, String message)
      Displays a success alert with the provided title and message.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the success alert.
      message - The message to display in the success alert.
